<details><summary>Edit file: /Users/cleberdasilvahensel/Desktop/source/ono-sendae/ia-book/extract_descriptions.py</summary>

**Chunk 1**

```diff
@@ -1,1 +1,127 @@
- 
+ #!/usr/bin/env python3
+ """
+ Script para extrair e formatar descriÃ§Ãµes dos episÃ³dios do JSON
+ """
+ 
+ import json
+ import re
+ 
+ def format_description(description):
+     """Formata uma descriÃ§Ã£o convertendo \n para quebras de linha e organizando markdown"""
+     
+     # Remove \n e quebra em linhas
+     lines = description.replace('\\n', '\n').split('\n')
+     
+     # Remove linhas vazias do inÃ­cio e fim
+     while lines and not lines[0].strip():
+         lines.pop(0)
+     while lines and not lines[-1].strip():
+         lines.pop()
+     
+     formatted_lines = []
+     current_section = ""
+     
+     for line in lines:
+         line = line.strip()
+         if not line:
+             formatted_lines.append("")
+             continue
+             
+         # Se Ã© um tÃ­tulo com emoji
+         if line.startswith('ğŸ¯') or line.startswith('ğŸ”') or line.startswith('ğŸ’»') or line.startswith('ğŸ“š') or line.startswith('âš–ï¸') or line.startswith('ğŸ“–') or line.startswith('ğŸ‘¤'):
+             # Adiciona quebra de linha antes se nÃ£o for o primeiro
+             if formatted_lines and formatted_lines[-1]:
+                 formatted_lines.append("")
+             
+             # Converte para markdown
+             if line.startswith('ğŸ¯'):
+                 formatted_lines.append("## " + line.replace('ğŸ¯', '').replace('**', '').strip())
+             else:
+                 formatted_lines.append("### " + line.replace('ğŸ”', '').replace('ğŸ’»', '').replace('ğŸ“š', '').replace('âš–ï¸', '').replace('ğŸ“–', '').replace('ğŸ‘¤', '').replace('**', '').strip())
+             formatted_lines.append("")
+             
+         # Se Ã© uma lista com bullet
+         elif line.startswith('â€¢'):
+             # Adiciona quebra antes da primeira lista se necessÃ¡rio
+             if formatted_lines and not formatted_lines[-1].startswith('-'):
+                 formatted_lines.append("")
+             formatted_lines.append("- " + line[1:].strip())
+             
+         # Se Ã© texto normal
+         else:
+             formatted_lines.append(line)
+     
+     # Processa links
+     final_lines = []
+     for line in formatted_lines:
+         # Converte URLs em links markdown
+         line = re.sub(r'(https?://[^\s]+)', r'[\1](\1)', line)
+         # Converte texto especÃ­fico em links
+         line = re.sub(r'Google Drive', '[Google Drive]', line)
+         line = re.sub(r'LinkedIn', '[LinkedIn]', line)
+         final_lines.append(line)
+     
+     return '\n'.join(final_lines)
+ 
+ def main():
+     # Carrega o JSON
+     with open('spotify-complete-metadata.json', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
+         data = json.load(f)
+     
+     # Extrai descriÃ§Ãµes dos episÃ³dios principais
+     main_episodes = []
+     special_episodes = []
+     
+     for episode in data['episodes']:
+         episode_info = {
+             'number': episode['episode_number'],
+             'title': episode['title'],
+             'type': episode['episode_type'],
+             'description': episode['description']
+         }
+         
+         if episode['episode_type'] == 'main':
+             main_episodes.append(episode_info)
+         else:
+             special_episodes.append(episode_info)
+     
+     # Ordena episÃ³dios principais numericamente
+     main_episodes.sort(key=lambda x: int(x['number']))
+     
+     # Gera markdown para episÃ³dios principais
+     main_content = ["# DescriÃ§Ãµes dos EpisÃ³dios - PadrÃµes de Design AgÃªnticos\n"]
+     
+     for episode in main_episodes:
+         main_content.append(f"## EpisÃ³dio {episode['number']} - {episode['title'].replace('[EpisÃ³dio ' + episode['number'] + '] ', '')}")
+         main_content.append("")
+         main_content.append(format_description(episode['description']))
+         main_content.append("")
+         main_content.append("---")
+         main_content.append("")
+     
+     # Gera markdown para episÃ³dios especiais
+     special_content = ["# EpisÃ³dios Especiais - PadrÃµes de Design AgÃªnticos\n"]
+     
+     for episode in special_episodes:
+         special_content.append(f"## EpisÃ³dio {episode['number']} - {episode['title'].replace('[EpisÃ³dio ' + episode['number'] + '] ', '')}")
+         special_content.append("")
+         special_content.append(format_description(episode['description']))
+         special_content.append("")
+         special_content.append("---")
+         special_content.append("")
+     
+     # Salva os arquivos
+     with open('episodes-descriptions-formatted.md', 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
+         f.write('\n'.join(main_content))
+     
+     with open('episodes-special-descriptions.md', 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
+         f.write('\n'.join(special_content))
+     
+     print(f"âœ… ExtraÃ­das {len(main_episodes)} descriÃ§Ãµes de episÃ³dios principais")
+     print(f"âœ… ExtraÃ­das {len(special_episodes)} descriÃ§Ãµes de episÃ³dios especiais")
+     print("ğŸ“ Arquivos criados:")
+     print("   - episodes-descriptions-formatted.md")
+     print("   - episodes-special-descriptions.md")
+ 
+ if __name__ == "__main__":
+     main()
```

</details>
